trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior" /> namespace contains classes for creating custom user interface behavior for components at design time.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior" /> 命名空间包含用于在设计时创建组件的自定义用户界面行为的类。

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the classes included in this namespace:
trans-unit.target: 以下列表显示此命名空间中包含的类：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> class for handling painting and hit-testing.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>类，用于处理的绘制和命中测试。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> class for managing a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects.
A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class for managing the custom user interface in a designer.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类，用于管理在设计器中的自定义用户界面。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine> class that represents horizontal and vertical line segments that assist users in aligning components at design time.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine>表示水平和垂直线段帮助用户在设计时对齐组件的类。
